reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 382/12: BORROWING BY-LAWS, DEBENTURES AND LOANS

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in the Table of Forms at the end of this Regulation and is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository under the listing for the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. In this Regulation, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in the Table of Forms at the end of this Regulation and is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository under the listing for the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities not within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 1. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 2 (1). (2) The borrowing by law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 2. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 2 (2). (3) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by a regional municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 3. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 2 (3).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities not within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 1. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 2 (1).

(2) The borrowing by law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by municipalities within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 2. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 2 (2).

(3) The borrowing by-law referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act, for use by a regional municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 3. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 2 (3).

content.content: 3. The debenture referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 4. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The debenture referred to in subsection 2 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 4. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 3.

content.content: 4. The affidavit of the clerk of the municipality referred to in subsection 2 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 5. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. The affidavit of the clerk of the municipality referred to in subsection 2 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 5. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 4.

content.content: 5. The application for a loan referred to in section 3 of the Act shall be in Form 6. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. The application for a loan referred to in section 3 of the Act shall be in Form 6. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 5.

content.content: 6. The inspection and completion certificate referred to in section 4 of the Act shall be in Form 7. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. The inspection and completion certificate referred to in section 4 of the Act shall be in Form 7. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 6.

content.content: 7. The offer to sell a debenture referred to in subsection 5 (8) of the Act, (a) in the case of use by a municipality not within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 8; and (b) in the case of use by a regional municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 9. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 7.
content.raw_html:
7. The offer to sell a debenture referred to in subsection 5 (8) of the Act,

(a) in the case of use by a municipality not within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 8; and

(b) in the case of use by a regional municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 9. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 7.

content.content: 8. The rating by-law referred to in section 8 of the Act shall be in Form 10. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 8.
content.raw_html: 8. The rating by-law referred to in section 8 of the Act shall be in Form 10. O. Reg. 382/12, s. 8.

content.content: 9. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 382/12, s. 9.
content.raw_html: 9. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 382/12, s. 9.
